title: QB Daniels set for MRI after exit due to hamstring
content: Commanders quarterback Jayden Daniels suffered a right hamstring injury early in the third quarter against the Dallas Cowboys on Sunday and was later ruled out, yet another blow to a banged-up Washington offense.

title: McDaniel: Focus remains on 1-6 Dolphins, not job
content: Dolphins coach Mike McDaniel said he isn't thinking about his job security, even after a 31-6 loss Sunday to the Browns dropped his team to 1-6.

title: Jets not ready to name QB1 after Fields benching
content: After a dismal first half Sunday, Justin Fields was replaced by backup Tyrod Taylor on the Jets' first offensive drive after halftime with New York trailing the Panthers 13-3.

title: RB Martin, former All-Pro with Bucs, dies at 36
content: Doug Martin, a former Boise State star who went on to be an All-Pro running back for the Buccaneers, has died, his family said in a statement Sunday. He was 36.

title: Vikes' Hockenson livid after replay overturns TD
content: T.J. Hockenson was livid Sunday when NFL replay overturned a fourth-quarter touchdown catch that would have closed the Philadelphia Eagles' lead to two points in the Vikings' eventual 28-22 loss.

title: Beamer calls S.C. 'dream job' amid Hokies chatter
content: South Carolina coach Shane Beamer pushed back Sunday about being rumored as a candidate for Virginia Tech's vacancy, saying he's in his "dream job" with the Gamecocks.

title: Hurts uncovers his 'swag,' helps Eagles stop skid
content: In the throes of a two-game losing streak, Philadelphia leaned on Jalen Hurts to help author an impressive 28-22 victory over the Minnesota Vikings on Sunday, pushing the Eagles' to 5-2 on a day when their quarterback threw for 326 yards and three scores.

title: Agents: Blazers' Sharpe, Camara reach extensions
content: The Trail Blazers agreed to four-year extension with both guard Shaedon Sharpe ($90 million) and forward Toumani Camara ($82 mllion), their agents told ESPN.

title: Biggest takeaways from Week 7: Thumbs-up for the Colts, Chiefs ... thumbs-down for the Jets, Dolphins
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 7.

title: Let's overreact to Week 7: Will the Vikings regret moving on from Sam Darnold?
content: We sized up overreactions, including fantasy football. Did the Vikings err at QB, and are the Chiefs the AFC favorite?

title: Week 7 winners and losers: Bo Nix, Eagles WRs soar; Jeanty posts season low
content: Bo Nix, A.J. Brown and Ja'Marr Chase led the way with big Week 7 performances, while Caleb Williams and Ashton Jeanty were among the biggest disappointments.

title: Buzz: Is Rashee Rice a WR1 moving forward?
content: A closer look at what stood out from Sunday's first set of games, including Rashee Rice's debut and struggling QBs.

title: Ohio State? Bama? Indiana? Anyone in the ACC? Who we can -- and can't -- trust
content: Parity has been the theme of the season, making it hard to know what's what. Bill Connelly is here to help.

title: Napier out at Florida: Top candidates, transfers and recruits to watch
content: The Florida job is open. Would another offensive coach make sense and could that coach hang on to the Gators' loaded roster?

title: How another round of top-10 losses shakes up playoff, bowl matchups
content: We project who will play where through the national title game as we move into the season's second half.

title: Man United's statement win at Anfield plunges Liverpool into crisis
content: Man United's win at Anfield on Sunday was the best of the Ruben Amorim era, and it also marked Liverpool's fourth straight defeat in all competitions.

title: NFL Week 7's fashionable arrivals, featuring Bijan Robinson rocking shorts and a cardigan
content: The stars strutted in their arrivals to the pregame tunnels in looks that match their personal style.

title: Introducing ESPN's Basketball Power Index for 2025-2026: Predictions for 23 NBA teams
content: The code is written. The simulations run. Here's who BPI projects to be in the top six in each conference, those fighting for play-in spots and three teams with high-variance young prospects.

title: Briscoe secures spot in NASCAR playoff finale
content: Chase Briscoe, driving the No. 19 Bass Pro Shops Toyota, gave Joe Gibbs Racing its second spot in NASCAR's championship-deciding season finale with an overtime victory Sunday afternoon at Talladega Superspeedway, his first career win at the famous venue.

title: Pavia's pose, Brohm's big win: Week 8's CFB superlatives
content: We awarded nontraditional superlatives to programs, players and performances from across Week 8 of the 2025 college football season.

title: Patriots fuel best week of NFL season for bettors, Broncos break 1,602-game streak
content: Mike Vrabel and the Patriots were one of seven favorites to win outright in the early Week 7 NFL slate.

title: College football: Alabama is team to beat in SEC, but title talk premature
content: Alabama has improved week after week, casting aside early doubts and establishing itself as a reliable bet.

title: NFL draft risers, questions and notes: Will Jeremiyah Love go in the top 10?
content: Could we see another top-10 running back? How many WRs should go in Round 1? We have notes on NFL prospects through CFB Week 8.

title: NWSL Power Rankings: Marta has Orlando looking ominous again
content: Marta's was in fine form on Saturday, helping Orlando beat Washington 3-2 and catapult the Pride up ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Marseille could offer Endrick a Madrid escape
content: Endrick hasn't played a minute for Madrid this season, and Marseille are ready to offer him an exit. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Offseason questions for eliminated teams: What's next for Brewers after NLCS defeat
content: Here's how the winter looks in Milwaukee -- and in the other towns whose teams lost their final postseason game.

title: 'It all turned so bad so fast': Inside James Franklin's Penn State departure
content: Penn State entered the season with national title aspirations. Six games in, the school fired its coach.

title: Both YSRCP and TDP are equally destructive forces, alleges Congress leader Thulasi Reddy
content: While the YSRCP government left the State buried in debt, crime, liquor, drugs, and cannabis, the coalition government made things worse by taking record loans of ₹1.5 lakh crore in 16 months and burdening electricity users with ₹15,480 crore in surcharges

title: Container Road still a death trap for motorists
content: Traffic congestion on Goshree bridges, lack of adequate streetlights and alleged unscientific road and junction designs are cited by local people as major causes behind accidents on Container Terminal Road

title: TNSDA completes the first phase of underwater survey off the Poompuhar coast
content: A team of 10 divers carried out the survey, which began on September 20 and continued for 12 days. The department is planning one more phase of exploration when the sea conditions are favourable

title: Karnataka invites ETH Zurich’s quantum pioneer to next Quantum India Summit in Bengaluru
content: The State government has deepened its international scientific engagement with ETH Zurich — one of the world’s leading institutions in quantum science and technology — through a visit to the ETH Quantum Center and an invitation for its leadership to participate in the Quantum India Summit 2026 in Bengaluru.

title: Trinamool leaders follow Abhishek, donate for flood relief in North Bengal
content: The WB government has sought donations under West Bengal State Disaster Management Authority (WBSDMA) Fund for flood relief. Abhishek Banerjee donated ₹1 lakh for flood relief, calling upon everyone to rise to the occasion and help rebuild shattered lives.

title: NC, PDP, BJP field members of the Shia clergy for J&K Assembly bypolls
content: This is the first time that Budgam, which has a sizable Shia population, will see three candidates from the Shia clergy contesting the by-polls

title: DGP appointment row: second contempt petition moved against Tamil Nadu government
content: In his petition, Madurai-based rights activist Henri Tiphagne says the action of the State was violative of the guidelines laid down by the Supreme Court in the Prakash Singh case

title: Mullaperiyar dam opened; Idukki and Theni face rain havoc
content: Man killed as intense overnight rain inundates roads and homes, triggers mudslides in Idukki; Tamil Nadu’s Theni district bordering Idukki too bore brunt of downpour; farmer dies in Virudhunagar after being washed away on flooded causeway

title: West Bengal BJP leader labels protesters ‘Bangladeshis who will be expelled in SIR’
content: The Nandigram BJP MLA who has been drumming up support for the Special Intensive Revision said that names of the ‘Bangladeshi Muslims’ who were behind the attack on his vehicle will be removed from the voter list after the SIR

title: Do cash transfers build women’s agency in India?
content: There is a need to ensure that women do not only receive money but also control, grow, and sustain it for their own advancement

title: 146 species recorded in Kaziranga bird survey
content: The avian count timed with Kati Bihu was conducted across five key locations of the Kaziranga National Park and the adjoining Laokhowa Wildlife Sanctuary

title: Bihar Assembly polls: PM Modi to launch election campaign from Karpoorigram
content: Bihar BJP State president Dilip Jaiswal said that PM would address an election rally in Begusarai on October 24

title: Low-pressure area likely over southeast Bay of Bengal by October 21: RMC
content: Under its influence, enhanced rainfall activity is likely over north Tamil Nadu and Puducherry between October 22 and 24

title: Fronts without faces: grand alliance, NDA reluctant to name CM candidate
content: Congress has not confirmed RJD ally Tejashwi Yadav as mahagathbandhan’s CM face; BJP has not confirmed CM and JD(U) chief Nitish Kumar as NDA’s choice; RJD, Congress candidates to clash in a dozen seats

title: Dynasts matter when it comes to Bihar elections, list of parties full of politicians' kin
content: Experts say that no party in Bihar can claim moral superiority on this ground as far as dynasts entering politics is concerned

title: Giriraj Singh’s remarks against Muslims trigger political row in Bihar
content: Union Minister says he does not want votes of ‘namak haram’; Opposition accuses BJP of polarising voters ahead of Assembly elections

title: PM Modi to face Quad, BRICS leaders at ASEAN meet next week
content: While New Delhi has yet to confirm the Prime Minister’s visit for the ASEAN-East Asia Summit, the Malaysian Foreign Minister said he would attend

title: IT Minister Lokesh exhorts Telugu diaspora in Australia to join efforts to rebuild Andhra Pradesh
content: The coalition government has development and welfare as twin priorities, and it is striving to achieve the objectives with utmost dedication, he says, adding that ‘one State, one capital, and decentralised development’ is its mission

title: Army Chief celebrates Deepavali with troops in forward areas; reaffirms operational readiness and civil-military synergy in Central Sector
content: During his visit to forward posts in Pithoragarh and adjoining areas, the COAS lauded the soldiers’ indomitable spirit and commitment to duty under extreme climatic and challenging terrain conditions

title: RSS route march in Sedam taken out despite curbs
content: Dramatic scenes unfolded as hundreds of uniformed RSS workers gathered and began their route march at 3 p.m. as scheduled

title: Andhra Pradesh is recovering, thanks to Centre’s support, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The State government is implementing the Super Six schemes, besides giving many benefits beyond the schemes, he says

title: Four killed in a blast at a house in Avadi where country-made firecrackers were stored
content: The house on Vivasaya Street at Thandurai near Pattabhiram  also functioned as a shop selling country-made firecrackers. The concrete roof and a few other portions of the house collapsed in the explosion that occurred around 3 p.m.

title: "Harmony, Happiness, Prosperity": PM Modi's Diwali Message To Nation
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday extended warm greetings to the nation on Diwali, wishing that the festival of lights illuminate people's lives with harmony, happiness and prosperity.

title: 2 Dead As Cargo Plane Skids Off Hong Kong Airport Runway Into Sea
content: Hong Kong's Civil Aviation Department said in a statement on Monday that the aircraft had "deviated from the north runway after landing and ditched into the sea."

title: Trump Threatens To Deploy Military In San Francisco To 'Make It Great'
content: Donald Trump threatened to send troops to San Francisco, in an interview that aired Sunday, as he looks to push the US military into more Democratic-controlled cities.

title: Passenger's Power Bank Catches Fire On Board IndiGo Flight At Delhi Airport
content: A passenger's power bank caught fire on board a Dimapur-bound IndiGo plane while taxiing at the Delhi airport on Sunday, which was extinguished by the cabin crew, sources said.

title: White Tiger 'Sameer' Dies Due To Age-Related Issues At Tirupati Zoo
content: A 19-year-old white tiger died at Sri Venkateshwara Zoological Park here on Sunday due to age-related ailments, officials said.

title: Trump Urged Zelensky To Cut Deal With Putin Or Risk Destruction: Report
content: Donald Trump urged Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky to accept Russia's terms for ending the war between Russia and Ukraine in a White House meeting.

title: Open Schooling Sees 70% Failure Rate in 10th Grade Exams Over Last 4 Years
content: Under the 'NIOS Project,' an average of 70 per cent of students who took the 10th grade examination have failed in the last four years - this was revealed by the Delhi Directorate of Education (DoE) in response to an RTI.

title: Centre Approves Rs 1,950 Crore To Karnataka, Maharashtra As Flood Relief
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah has approved advance release of Rs 1,950.80 crore as second instalment of central share of State Disaster Response Fund to Karnataka and Maharashtra governments for 2025-26.

title: Wife Can Stay In Shared House Even If In-Laws Disown Husband: High Court
content: The Delhi High Court has held that a wife residing in the house immediately after her marriage constitutes "shared household" and is entitled to reside there despite the husband being disowned by his parents later.

title: Man Runs Truck Over Younger Brother After Dispute Over EMIs
content: A man mowed down his younger brother with a truck following a dispute over loan instalment payments in Jharkhand's Deoghar district on Sunday, police said.

title: UP Man Kills Wife With Hammer Over 'Daily Fights', Arrested
content: A man allegedly killed his wife with a hammer on Sunday following a domestic argument, police here said.

title: $60 Million Diamond, Crowns: What Was In Gallery Targeted In Louvre Heist
content: Thieves pulled up outside the Louvre and used an extendable ladder to break into an upper window that looks into the Galerie d'Apollon, or Apollo Gallery.

title: Copper Coins, Gold Stick: What Was Found In Banke Bihari Temple's Treasury
content: The treasury of the Banke Bihari temple in Mathura, which had been locked since 1971, was opened for the second consecutive day to complete the remaining inspection work as per the directions of the Supreme Court-appointed high-powered committee

title: US Strikes Another Colombian Drug-Running Boat, This Time A Rebel Vessel
content: The United States announced Sunday another strike against what it called a drug-running boat, this time attacking an alleged Colombian leftist rebel vessel in an apparent expansion of a US military operation off the coasts of South America.

title: Enhanced Anti-Pollution Curbs Under GRAP-2 Invoked In Delhi As AQI Dips
content: Anti-pollution curbs under GRAP-2 have been invoked for Delhi and surrounding areas as the Air Quality Index has plunged ahead of Diwali. Curbs under GRAP-1 had been enforced just last week.

title: Delhi's Diwali Gets Its Crackle Back. This Time The Green Way
content: Happiness and excitement returned to the national capital's markets on Sunday as the sale of green firecrackers began ahead of Diwali, following the Supreme Court's nod to allow the use of certified eco-friendly crackers this year.

title: PM Modi Urges Citizens To Mark Festive Season By Buying 'Swadeshi' Products
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday urged citizens to ring in the festive season by buying swadeshi products and celebrating the hard work of 140 crore Indians.

title: 'Caged, Starved, Flogged': A Window Into Israeli Hostages' Harrowing Ordeal
content: Relatives of the last Israeli hostages released from Gaza after two years in captivity said their loved ones endured harrowing conditions, with some reportedly held in cages, pits or underground tunnels.

title: Banned Cough Syrup Worth Rs 3 Crore Seized In UP, 3 Arrested
content: A joint team of police and excise department officials seized banned cough syrup worth Rs 3 crore and arrested three accused in this connection here, an official said on Sunday.

title: Thiruvananthapuram gears up for Kerala School Sports Meet
content: Event will be held across 12 venues from October 21 to 28. Nearly 20,000 athletes, including participants from inclusive sports categories, will compete

title: Watch: Chirag Paswan: The art of the deal | Talking Politics
content: Both the BJP and JD(U) have been allocated 101 seats each, while the Rashtriya Lok Morcha (RLM) led by Upendra Kushwaha and the Hindustani Awam Morcha (Secular) led by Union Minister Jitan Ram Manjhi have been allocated six seats each. Mr. Paswan also took a dig at the INDIA bloc, known as ‘Mahagathbandhan’ in Bihar, claiming that “there is so much infighting among the Opposition alliance partners”.

title: Bihar Assembly polls: Denied ticket to contest, candidates allege demands for money in the INDIA bloc
content: Congress’s Mohammad Afaque Alam’s demanded an investigation by Rahul Gandhi; the RJD’s Madan Prasad protested outside former CM Rabri Devi’s residence, and Ritu Jaiswal said she would contest as an independent candidate

title: Plan to privatise medical education and healthcare through PPP violates constitutional right to life, says former IAS officer P.V. Ramesh
content: He accuses the Andhra Pradesh government of using financial constraints as a pretext to divert pubic assets to its associates

title: RSS route march in Chittapur: Karnataka High Court directs Kalaburagi district administration to give report indicating action taken in according permission for November 2 pathasanchalana
content: The High Court of Karnataka, in a special sitting on Sunday, directed the Kalaburagi district administration to submit a report by October 24 indicating the action taken in according permission for the revised proposal of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) to hold pathasanhalana (route march) in Chittapur on November 2 instead of October 19, as was proposed earlier.

title: National lighting workshop illuminates Sangeetha Nataka Akademi
content: As many as 25 participants from across India participate in the workshop, which will conclude on October 24

title: Four districts in Kerala have recurrent summer water stress, says CWRDM study
content: As much as 24.74% of the wards in Kasaragod, 22.01% in Thiruvananthapuram, 20.72% in Pathanamthitta, and 20.48% in Kozhikode are experiencing water shortage in summer months

title: It is the INDIA bloc, not just MVA, which must decide on any new alliance partner in Maharashtra: State Congress chief
content: His statement comes amidst rumours of an alliance between Shiv Sena (UBT), MNS; Constitutional values non-negotiable, Congress will not tolerate polarisation of any kind, says State party chief

title: MNS chief Raj Thackeray claims 96 lakh fake voters in Maharashtra, demands poll roll overhaul
content: The MNS chief demanded a complete clean-up of voters’ list before any polls are held, calling the alleged manipulation a “mockery of democracy”

title: Garbage dumped under metro pillars turns Bannerghatta Road stretch into stinking blackspot
content: Local residents allege that the problem has worsened over the past two months, as piles of mixed waste continue to accumulate daily under the metro corridor

title: Future Founders Programme showcases early-stage innovations of promising start-ups
content: The six-week pre-incubation initiative of the Ratan Tata Innovation Hub is aimed at guiding aspiring entrepreneurs in minimising start-up risks, while preparing them for full-scale incubation and market entry

title: SCR Vijayawada Division collects record ₹1.22 crore in ticket checking drive
content: More than 700 ticket checking officers book 17,017 cases during three-day drive, says  Senior Divisional Commercial Manager

title: Hyderabad streets glow with colours, lights and festive spirit ahead of Deepavali
content: Popular shopping hubs such as Begum Bazar and Jambagh thronged with crowds from morning until night. Families navigated through narrow lanes, balancing shopping bags and bursting crackers with children in tow

title: VHP to launch Free Hindu Temples campaign
content: Why the same rules are not applicable to religious places belonging to other faiths, asks VHP North Karnataka president Lingraj Appa

title: Tamil Nadu government fully prepared to face northeast monsoon, says Stalin
content: After chairing a review meeting at the State Emergency Operations Centre in Chennai, the Chief Minister says all precautionary measures have been taken and that there is no danger or risk at present

title: Assam govt. shielding accused in Zubeen Garg death case: Congress
content: Gaurav Gogoi alleges SIT formed to protect those close to the Chief Minister; tributes held across Assam a month after singer’s passing

title: Digital University Kerala scientists develop AI system to detect antenna types without physical testing
content: Innovation could lead to self-diagnosing communication modules in satellites, drones and Internet of Things devices to enable real-time performance monitoring and fault detection

title: Eight private industrial parks functional in Kerala, says Rajeeve
content: Industries Minister says until now around ₹1,750 crore has been invested across these parks. The govt. has set aside 448 acres of land for industrial use across the 37 parks approved by the department

title: Jharkhand bypoll: Ghatsila to witness three-cornered contest with JLKM fielding candidate
content: The JLKM was said to have played a spoilsport for national alliances, including the NDA in several seats, particularly in Bokaro, Ramgarh, Gomia, Dhanbad and Giridih belt of the state, in the 2024 Assembly polls

title: Massive blaze at firecracker market in U.P.’s Fatehpur guts 65 shops, crackers worth crores destroyed
content: According to eyewitnesses, the fire broke out around 12.30 p.m. at one of the cracker stalls, allegedly sparked by a short-circuit

title: Organise CII Partnership Summit in Vizag on the lines of WEF meet in Davos, A.P. CM Chandrababu Naidu tells officials
content: The Port City is poised to emerge as a global destination with the establishment of the Google AI data centre, and no opportunity should go waste, he insists

title: 'India will keep paying tariffs if ...': Trump's warning on Russian oil; repeats 'spoke to PM Modi' claim
content: US President  Donald Trump has once again warned India of "massive" tariffs if it continues to purchase Russian oil, claiming Prime Minister Modi personally assured him of a halt. Earlier, the ministry of external affairs has rejected these remarks, stating its energy policy prioritizes consumer interests and stable, secure supplies through diversified sourcing.

title: Durgapur rape case: 2 accused file plea to confess; survivor says classmate molested her and fled
content: Two accused in the Durgapur gang-rape case, Sk Riyazuddin and Sk Safiq, have sought court permission to confess their involvement. The 23-year-old MBBS student was allegedly attacked after leaving campus. The court sent the accused to jail custody for two days to reconsider their plea. The survivor identified her classmate as one of the assailants.

title: IndiGo flight fire scare: Passenger power bank catches fire at Delhi airport; crew douses flames
content: A passenger's power bank ignited on an IndiGo flight bound for Dimapur while taxiing at Delhi airport on Sunday. Cabin crew swiftly extinguished the fire, ensuring no injuries. The aircraft underwent checks and was cleared for operation after relevant authorities were informed.

title: Diwali 2025: 85+ heartfelt wishes, greetings, messages, and quotes
content: Diwali, the festival of lights, celebrates Lord Ram's return and the triumph of good over evil. Homes glow with diyas and rangolis, filled with sweets and laughter. Beyond its mythology, Diwali signifies dispelling ignorance with knowledge and hatred with love. It's a time for gratitude, forgiveness, and new beginnings, with families uniting and prayers for prosperity.

title: After going for AI agents, laying off 4K employees; Salesforce CEO says: AI doesn't have a soul
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff is sending mixed signals on AI's workplace impact. While his company replaced 4,000 support jobs with AI agents, he claims AI lacks the human touch essential for sales roles. Despite these cuts, Salesforce is now hiring thousands of new salespeople, highlighting a strategic division between AI-handled support and human-centric sales.

title: Virat Kohli steps aside, pushes Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer to walk first - watch
content: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma made their return to the Indian ODI side in Perth, but both experienced disappointing outings. Kohli was dismissed for a duck, caught by Cooper Connolly off Mitchell Starc, while Sharma's 500th international match ended with him scoring just eight runs, caught by Matthew Renshaw off Josh Hazlewood.

title: 'Do you have MS Dhoni's?': R Ashwin exposes fake Adam Zampa, reveals chat
content: Ravichandran Ashwin humorously exposed an impersonator posing as Adam Zampa on WhatsApp, who sought Indian players' contact details. Ashwin playfully engaged, even asking for MS Dhoni's number. This incident follows a similar encounter where Ashwin was tricked by someone claiming to be Devon Conway.

title: Gemini AI Diwali picture prompts: Capture joy, lights, and traditional celebrations
content: Diwali, the festival of lights, is brought to life with stunning, hyper-realistic images generated by Gemini AI. The AI captures the essence of traditional celebrations, from intricate rangoli patterns and glowing diyas to festive family moments and vibrant fireworks. These lifelike visuals are perfect for preserving memories and showcasing the joy of Diwali.

title: '7 planes were shot down': Trump yet again claims he stopped India-Pak war
content: US President Donald Trump once again claimed he averted a war between India and Pakistan by threatening steep trade tariffs. He stated that warning both nations of 200% tariffs pushed them to de-escalate tensions following military actions. India, however, has consistently denied any foreign intervention in its diplomatic and military responses.

title: Doug Martin passes away: How did the former NFL Buccaneers RB die at 36
content: Former Tampa Bay Buccaneers star running back Doug Martin has tragically passed away at 36. The cause of death remains unconfirmed, with his family requesting privacy. Known as "Muscle Hamster," Martin was a two-time Pro Bowler whose explosive NFL career with Tampa Bay and the Raiders left a lasting impact. The NFL community mourns the loss of the respected player.

title: Massive shake-up at ScaleAI: Zuckerberg-backed firm lays off entire team
content: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Hong Kong plane crash: Cargo jet skids off runway into sea; two dead
content: A cargo plane from Dubai skidded off the runway at Hong Kong International Airport early Monday, plunging into the sea. The Emirates SkyCargo flight collided with a ground-service vehicle, tragically killing two workers. The four crew members on board the Boeing 747 freighter were unharmed.

title: ‘Shouted, cursed,’: Trump urged Zelenskyy to accept Putin’s terms— Inside US meeting with Ukraine
content: President Trump reportedly urged Ukrainian President Zelenskyy to accept Putin's terms to end the war, warning of destruction if Ukraine refused. During a contentious meeting, Trump discarded battlefield maps and echoed Russian talking points, ultimately declining to supply long-range missiles.

title: Silver market crisis: Panic in London! How market broke – Is demand in India the cause?
content: India's Diwali silver buying frenzy, fueled by social media hype, triggered a global market crisis. Unprecedented demand drained inventories, leading to a severe shortage and extreme price volatility. This surge, combined with industrial growth and ETF accumulation, pushed the silver market to its breaking point.

title: Lauren Kyle turns heads in chic NYC night out as McDavid hits road
content: While Connor McDavid's Oilers faced a tough loss in New York, his wife Lauren Kyle captivated fans with a glamorous girls' night out. Sharing stylish moments on Instagram, she showcased elegance and city sophistication, enjoying espresso martinis with friends. Her vibrant presence off the ice highlights the dynamic lives of NHL partners.

title: Christian McCaffrey defends Olivia Culpo, says their love is built on respect
content: Former Miss Universe Olivia Culpo and San Francisco Forty-Niners star Christian McCaffrey have welcomed their first child. Daughter Colette Annalise was born in July 2025. Their journey began with social media interactions in 2019. They married in Rhode Island in June 2024. This new parenthood marks a significant milestone for the couple.

title: NBA trade rumor: Celtics eye $186M Bucks star to pair with Jayson Tatum
content: Boston Celtics may pursue Giannis Antetokounmpo if Jayson Tatum misses the 2025-26 season due to injury. A hypothetical trade involves sending Jaylen Brown and assets to Milwaukee for Giannis, Myles Turner, and Bobby Portis. This bold move could reshape both franchises, creating a new core for Boston and a rebuild for the Bucks.

title: How India can still qualify for Women's World Cup semifinals - scenarios explained
content: India's Women's World Cup hopes hang by a thread after a narrow four-run loss to England. Chasing 289, India fell short despite strong performances from Mandhana and Harmanpreet. Now fourth, India must win their remaining matches against New Zealand and Bangladesh to secure a semifinal spot, with their fate also dependent on other results.

title: Veteran composer Klaus Doldinger, known for ‘The Never Ending Story’, passes away
content: Legendary German saxophonist and composer Klaus Doldinger, renowned for his iconic soundtracks for 'Das Boot' and 'The NeverEnding Story', has passed away at 89. His family confirmed his death on October 16. Doldinger's career was marked by his passion for jazz and his desire to create emotionally resonant, independent music.

title: Mitch Marner’s net worth: Check how much wealth Golden Knights right winger has
content: Mitch Marner, a dynamic right-winger, has joined the Vegas Golden Knights on a significant eight-year, $96 million contract, boosting his estimated net worth to $20-25 million.  His move from the Toronto Maple Leafs, following a career-best 102-point season, also brings lucrative endorsements from major brands. Fans anticipate his impact on the upcoming NHL season.

title: Tears in dugout: Smriti Mandhana breaks down as India stare at World Cup exit
content: England secured a thrilling four-run victory over hosts India in Indore to reach the Women's World Cup semi-finals. Heather Knight's century powered England to 288/8, and despite India's strong chase, crucial wickets shifted the momentum, ultimately leading to a heartbreaking defeat for the home side.

title: Bihar polls: Tears & kurta-tearing in opposition camp; campaign still cold
content: Bihar's INDIA bloc faces internal turmoil as nomination deadlines loom, with partners fielding candidates against each other and no resolution in sight. This discord contrasts sharply with the NDA's robust campaign. Meanwhile, ticket denials have sparked dramatic protests across the state, with disgruntled aspirants expressing deep anguish and betrayal just weeks before polling begins.

title: Top 10 richest streamers in the US (2025 updated list)
content: The streaming industry has propelled top content creators to multi-billion dollar fortunes.  This article highlights the richest streamers in the USA for 2025, with Felix "xQc" Lengyel leading the pack with a net worth of $50 million.  Other prominent figures like Ninja, Shroud, and Adin Ross also feature prominently on the list.

title: Watch: Israel bombards Hamas sites in Gaza, 33 killed; later resumes truce enforcement
content: Israel launched airstrikes and artillery attacks on dozens of Hamas targets in Gaza after the group reportedly violated a ceasefire. The IDF struck weapon storage sites, military infrastructure, and a six-kilometer underground tunnel. Gaza's civil defense reported at least 33 killed in the Israeli strikes.

title: ‘Will impact every sector’: China’s new rare earth curbs to hit Indian manufacturing; here’s how
content: India's manufacturing sector now faces a crisis due to China's latest rare earth export curbs. Restrictions on components with rare earth magnets will significantly impact automotive, electronics, and machinery firms. Industry leaders warn of widespread disruption.

title: What is Psoriatic Arthritis: Know its signs, causes, and how to manage
content: Psoriatic arthritis impacts skin and joints. It causes pain, swelling, and stiffness. This condition often follows psoriasis. Genetics and environmental factors play a role. Early detection is crucial. It helps manage inflammation and prevent joint damage. Prompt medical consultation is advised for better outcomes. This allows for a more active life.

title: Women's WC: India suffer heartbreaking defeat to England; semi-final hopes dented
content: India suffered a heart-breaking four-run defeat against England, jeopardizing their 2025 Women's ODI World Cup semifinal qualification. Despite strong performances from Smriti Mandhana, Harmanpreet Kaur and Deepti Sharma, a brilliant century by Heather Knight proved decisive. India must now win their next match to have a chance at advancing to the semis.

title: 'Make a deal': Putin makes war-end offer to Trump; what does he want from Ukraine?
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has demanded full control of Donetsk from Ukraine as a condition to end the war, according to The Washington Post. This demand was reportedly made during a call with US President Donald Trump. While Putin offered concessions in Zaporizhzhia and Kherson, European diplomats dismissed the proposal as insignificant.

title: Watch: Ayodhya Deepotsav sets 2 world records; millions of diyas illuminate city of Lord Ram
content: Ayodhya's Deepotsav 2025 illuminated the city with millions of diyas, marking the ninth edition of the festival celebrating Lord Ram's life. The event set two Guinness World Records for the most people performing simultaneous diya rotations and the largest display of oil lamps. Chief minister Yogi Adityanath inaugurated the festivities, which also featured Ramayana-themed tableaux, folk performances, and drone shows.

title: Even healthy people face liver cancer risk: Doctors highlight warning signs
content: Liver cancer is a growing global concern, affecting non-drinkers due to conditions like MASLD and MASH linked to lifestyle factors. Early detection through routine screenings is vital, as symptoms are often subtle. Modern treatments like TACE offer hope when surgery isn't an option. Proactive lifestyle changes and regular check-ups are key to prevention and better outcomes.

title: Diwali bank holidays 2025: Check the complete state-wise schedule
content: Diwali celebrations in October 2025 will bring several bank holidays across India. Different states will observe closures on various days for festivals like Naraka Chaturdashi, Laxmi Puja, Govardhan Puja, and Bhai Dooj. Some regions will experience extended breaks. Customers can use digital banking services during these periods. Planning transactions in advance is recommended.

title: Pakistan condemns ICC’s statement on Afghan cricketers’ deaths
content: Pakistan has strongly criticized the International Cricket Council ICC. The ICC issued a statement regarding the deaths of Afghan cricketers. Pakistan's Information Minister rejected the statement. He stated the ICC did not verify claims made by the Afghanistan Cricket Board ACB. The ACB withdrew its team from a tri-series in Pakistan. Zimbabwe will replace Afghanistan in the series.

title: Cowboys’ Trevon Diggs lists $4 million Texas home amid trade rumours
content: Dallas Cowboys star Trevon Diggs will miss the Week 7 game due to a concussion. This injury, sustained off-field, follows reports of his Texas home being listed for sale. Diggs has a history of disagreements with the team's management. These events are increasing speculation about a potential trade before the deadline. His future in Dallas appears uncertain.

title: Bihar polls: Nitish Kumar's 10th CM bid – what's at stake for veteran JD(U) leader
content: Bihar chief minister Nitish Kumar is set for a significant electoral battle. He aims to retain his position with NDA support. This election is critical for his legacy and his party's standing. Voters will consider his governance record and potential political fatigue. The BJP's growing influence presents a new dynamic. The outcome will shape Bihar's political future.

title: Bihar polls: 5 tips Cong can take from BJP’s pre-poll playbook - from cadre to alliance
content: As Bihar heads for assembly polls, the Congress and its allies grapple with seat-sharing disputes and mixed messaging, contrasting sharply with the BJP's methodical campaign. The BJP's strengths in ground cadre, alliance discipline, unified leadership, data-driven candidate selection, and forward-looking campaigning offer crucial lessons for the Congress's revival.

title: 3 die after US launches strike on 'drug' vessel — watch video
content: The US Department of War confirmed a lethal strike on October 17th, targeting a vessel linked to the ELN terrorist organization. Three individuals, described as "narco-terrorists," were killed in international waters. Officials vowed to hunt down and eliminate such groups, likening them to Al Qaeda in their threat to national security and the American populace.

title: MP: UPI payment fails; passenger barters watch for samosa to catch train
content: a passenger at jabalpur station handed over his watch when a vendor allegedly grabbed his collar . the customer had got off a passing train briefly to buy food on Oct 17 . a viral video shows the vendor turning violent even as others look on . police said he had been warned against repeating such misbehaviour .

title: Delhi-Beijing ties: 'Together we can solve issues that West can’t,' says China envoy
content: china's consul general to india calls for deeper cooperation between the two neighbours . envoy says the city holds a special advantage because of its climate, urban development, and thriving tech ecosystem . china breaks silence on border Clash, Follows India To Tell Pakistan, Afghanistan to End Crisis .

title: Ladakh violence: Centre invites Leh, Kargil delegations for fresh talks; meet on Oct 22
content: both ladakhi groups withdrew from dialogue following the sept 24 police firing that left four dead and over 70 wounded during violent protests . the talks are set to discuss constitutional safeguards on land, culture, and environment, sources say .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 8: Big move for Bama
content: the 13 members of the college football playoff selection committee will meet for two days . they're going to meet at the Gaylord Texan Resort in Grapevine, Texas . the committee will do their own mock ranking to help the new members better understand the process .

title: AP Week 8 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: two top five teams lost in week 8, with Miami losing to Louisville and Ole Miss blowing a multi-score lead against Georgia . Ohio State looked as steady as ever in a 34-0 shutout of Wisconsin and Indiana blew out Michigan State to remain undefeated .

title: Verstappen turned predictable McLaren duel into thrilling three-way title fight
content: Max Verstappen becomes the first driver to win seven races in the united states . he is within 40 points of championship leader Oscar Piastri with five races and two sprints to go . the 2025 season is a three-way fight .

title: Vanderbilt poking fun at LSU headlines Week 8 college football trolls
content: the trolls came out in week 8 of the college football season . the Commodores defeated no. 10 LSU 31-24 on saturday . quarterback Diego Pavia accounted for 246 yards and three touchdowns .
